説明文: The half tax" that allowed half of a provinces public revenue to be used for the prosecution of the civil war. This Provided the financial basis for the rise of regional magnates (daimyo). Takauji promulgated this in 1352, which allowed for half of a province's public revenue to be used for provisions, thereby enabling his allies to successfully wage war in the provinces."
